titles.title: Cryptocurrency Cybersecurity Information Sharing Act
Cryptocurrency Cybersecurity Information Sharing Act
A bill to amend the Cybersecurity Information Sharing Act of 2015 to include voluntary information sharing of cyber threat indicators among cryptocurrency companies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Cryptocurrency Cybersecurity Information Sharing Act
This bill revises the Cybersecurity Information Sharing Act of 2015 to include cryptocurrency companies and insurance providers that insure against cybersecurity threats. The act allows companies to share information regarding cybersecurity threats with the federal government and with one another.
The Financial Crimes Enforcement Network and the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency must set forth procedures for these companies to provide notice to the federal government of such threats.
